name: nokia-interface-mockup
description: Show basic interface flow for one object

scripts.test: echo "Error: this developer isn't really all that into tests" && exit 1
scripts.watch: echo "Assuming you meant watch:touch (and not watch:overhang)." && npm run watch:touch
scripts.watch:touch: npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js:touch & npm run watch:js:docent & npm run watch:html:touch
scripts.watch:overhang: npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js:overhang & npm run watch:js:docent & npm run watch:html:overhang
scripts.watch:js: npm run watch:js:touch & npm run watch:js:overhang & npm run watch:js:docent
scripts.build: npm run build:touch && npm run build:overhang
scripts.build:touch: npm run build:css:touch && npm run build:js:touch
scripts.build:overhang: npm run build:css:overhang && npm run build:js:overhang
scripts.build:css: npm run build:css:touch && npm run build:css:overhang
scripts.build:js: npm run build:js:touch && npm run build:js:overhang
scripts.build:js:touch: browserify touch_table/js/index.js > touch_table/static/index-browserified.js && browserify touch_table/js/docent.js > touch_table/static/docent-browserified.js
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run watch
scripts.start:overhang: npm run build:overhang && npm run watch:overhang

author: Fake Love
